tutorial_modal.title: Get started with the Builder
tutorial_modal.subtitle: The Builder is super easy to use, here are some tips before you begin
tutorial_modal.slide0: To move an object, click and drag the object.{br}If you need more precise control, click the Move icon on the toolbar and use the gizmos to manipulate the object.
tutorial_modal.slide1: To add objects to your scene, browse the categories on the right, or try searching for keywords like “rock” or “tree”.{br}Click the item you want, or drag-and-drop the it into your scene.
tutorial_modal.slide2: To orient the camera, click and drag on the view. Use the arrow keys to move the camera.{br}To preview your scene in first person, click the Eye in the upper right of the toolbar.
